description: Try this summer spaghetti bolognese recipe with sweet cherry tomatoes and fresh basil. This healthier pasta is sure to be a winner with the whole family.
keywords: Pasta,Low salt,Healthier Easier,Low sugar,Beef,Bolognese,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,Mince,Tomato
name: Summer Bolognese Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook pasta in a saucepan of salted, boiling water according to packet instructions. Drain, reserving 3/4 cup cooking liquid.

Meanwhile, heat oil in a large, deep frying pan over high heat. Cook mince, breaking up lumps with a wooden spoon, for 6 minutes or until well browned. Add garlic and cook, stirring, for 1 minute or until fragrant.

Add tomato paste and stir to combine. Add canned tomatoes and reserved cooking liquid, then stir to combine. Add spinach and pasta, then cook, tossing, for 2 minutes or until spinach is wilted and mixture is combined. Add mix-a-mato tomatoes and toss to combine. Season with pepper.
Serve pasta scattered with basil and parmesan.
